ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 6 x Professional 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft IR Distance. Free HDMI Male - Male Cable and Visitor chime. HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
8 Channel H.264 video compression format; support 960H & D1 resolution     HDMI output for better resolution     New GUI     PTZ Control     Multiple operation modes (Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance and Mobile monitoring)     USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation
GW40WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof       Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor     Zoom & focus outside adjusting     Auto Gain Control     Auto Electronic Shutter     Great for outdoor security
